titles.title: Service Member and Family Operational Tempo Relief Act of 2019
Service Member and Family Operational Tempo Relief Act of 2019

A bill to amend title 10, United States Code, to improve policy and data collection in connection with personnel tempo of the Armed Forces and the United States Special Operations Command, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.

bill.summary:
Service Member and Family Operational Tempo Relief Act of 2019
This bill requires the Department of Defense and each military department to follow specific and measurable deployment thresholds for members of the Armed Forces when exceeding deployment time limits due to U.S. national security interests.
